edu.biu.scapi.securityLevel

Interface NonMalleable

  • All Superinterfaces:
    EncSecLevel, Indistinguishable, SecurityLevel
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    AuthenticatedEnc, Cca2, CramerShoupDDHEnc, RSAOaepEnc
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BcRSAOaep, CramerShoupAbs, CryptoPPRSAOaep, OpenSSLRSAOaep, RSAOaepAbs, ScCramerShoupDDHOnByteArray, ScCramerShoupDDHOnGroupElement, ScEncryptThenMac

    public interface NonMalleable
extends Indistinguishable
    This interface should be used for encryption schemes that achieve non-malleability, meaning that it is infeasible for an adversary to generate a related ciphertext. Non-malleability always implies indistinguishability.
    Author:
    Cryptography and Computer Security Research Group Department of Computer Science Bar-Ilan University (Yael Ejgenberg)
